ygData.subject: RE: Cazic Thule (was: EQ Party!!!)
ygData.msgSnippet: Un-nerf Cazic? I got from Brad and John that they were gonna un-nerf the entire zone. John s quote after us telling him that we were planning on going to Fear
ygData.messageBody:
Un-nerf Cazic? I got from Brad and John that they were gonna un-nerf the
entire zone. John's quote after us telling him that we were planning on
going to Fear next week, "Let's drink to your characters now while they are
still alive." Brad's comment about making the zone-in point relatively safe
was that it was a moment of weakness on his part. He sorta had this odd
smile on his face then... =/

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)


8)-----Original Message-----
8)From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
8)[mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
8)Sent: Saturday, August 07, 1999 4:42 PM
8)To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
8)Subject: RE: [eqbards] Cazic Thule (was: EQ Party!!!)
8)
8)
8)From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
8)
8)Oh yeah is right, they already did this. 24 of us took him
8)on last night
8)(we knew he was fixed but had to try), we were all level 45
8)to 50, and he
8)pretty much laughed and laid waste to us all. we maybe got
8)10 to 15% dmg on
8)him. he now hits for double 235's (i think 185 was the max
8)before) and his
8)FAVORITE thing is to knock you back a few hundred feet for
8)some dmg (like a
8)horizontal gravity flux) then summon you to his feet to bash
8)you some more.
8)i think we will stick to everything else in the zone, all the
8)normal stuff,
8)dracoliche is still easy enough, everything guarding Cazic is
8)doable, and
8)leave Cazic alone shouting to the zone to beware, cause now
8)you better cause
8)its true.
8)
8)Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
8)Erisi, Level 15 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr
8)
8)
8)> -----Original Message-----
8)
8)> Oh yeah, he said Cazic (the God in the Fear Plane?) is gonna
8)> be "fixed" real
8)> soon now. So, you high levs better git your killin in while
8)> the killin is
8)> good - sounds like they are gonna un-nerf him.
8)> >
8)
